definition: see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]

sentences.english: Colors embody the vivid characteristics of the age and fashion.
sentences.chinese: 色彩是賦有鮮明的時代感和時髦性的。

sentences.english: Edit text, colors, styling, and layout using the new tablet UI look.
sentences.chinese: 編輯文本，色彩，造型和佈局使用新的UI看片。

sentences.english: Days are coloured bubbles that float upon the surface of fathomless night.
sentences.chinese: 白晝是色彩繽紛的浮沫，於深邃的夜色中浮蕩。

sentences.english: This nutrient superstar is found concentrated in the brightly colored skins and flesh of most foods in their natural form.
sentences.chinese: 該超級營養素在天然果蔬的色彩繽紛的皮肉中很多。

sentences.english: The hexagonal pot shown in this picture is painted with five-colors and was put to auction at Sotheby's in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 畫上五色彩的六角盆圖片在荷蘭的蘇富比拍賣。

sentences.english: Don't complain beneath the stars about the lack of bight sopts in your life.
sentences.chinese: 不要在星星下抱怨生活中缺乏色彩。

sentences.english: He had suggested that we might keep an eye open for any large or colorful spiders .
sentences.chinese: 他建議我們留心色彩豔麗或大的蜘蛛。

sentences.english: They are three-dimensional and they have feelings attached.
sentences.chinese: 這是三維的，而且是帶有情感色彩的。

sentences.english: Local colour lends [adds] peculiar interest to the novel.
sentences.chinese: 地方色彩給這部小說增加了興味。

sentences.english: The reasonable color combination can make your beautiful eyes more charming and attractive.
sentences.chinese: 合理的色彩組合，令雙眼嫵媚動人。

sentences.english: One afternoon someone noticed a slight yellowish-brown tint in the spring .
sentences.chinese: 一個下午某人在春天注意了輕微的淡黃棕色的色彩。

sentences.english: B：It's very colorful because many leaves of trees change colours in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是色彩繽紛的，因爲各種樹葉在秋天改變了顏色。

sentences.english: These systems include the additive and subtractive color wheels, which are addressed as metaphorical maps of color.
sentences.chinese: 這些色彩體系包括色環的加減，都標於色彩的隱晦圖。

sentences.english: These systems include the additive and subtractive color wheels, which are addressed as metaphorical maps of color.
sentences.chinese: 這些色彩體系包括色環的加減，都標於色彩的隱晦圖。

sentences.english: BE what make the campus life that we enrich back a riotous color gradually?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼使我們豐富的校園生活漸退了繽紛的色彩呢？

sentences.english: I use the strong contrast of the color to romance the picture and extrude the subject.
sentences.chinese: 以反差強烈的色彩渲染畫面，突出主題。

definition: warm color (arch.)/esp. yellow, orange or red
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
